PAPIER-MACHE PIN BOXES

A treat for the art lovers, handcrafted are Papier-Mache pin boxes that will bring animated charm to your living space. Let this classic and exclusive piece of decor spread colour and warmth within your home. You can also store your precious little things in these boxes.

Material:
    Mashed Paper (Wood) and Papier-Mache.
Care:
    Dust it with a soft cotton cloth to keep away the dirt.
Usage:
    Can be used to store sweets or your little items
Sizes:
    3'' .
Shipping Info:
    Dispatched in a maximum of 6 business days

Criwel embroidery Kashmir.

Criwel embroidery Kashmir.

The most celebrated of traditional Kashmiri handicrafts is embroidery. A special kind of embroidery done with a pointed hook used for drapery and upholstery is known as crewel. Because of the high quality of embroidery done on wall hangings and rugs, Kashmiri crewel-work is in great demand throughout the world. Crewel embroidery is a fascinating needle art. Typically done in thin wool thread on linen or cotton fabric, crewel work provides a texture not seen in silk or cotton embroidery. A special kind of embroidery done with a pointed hook used for drapery and upholstery is known as crewel. Because of the high quality of embroidery done on wall hangings and rugs, Kashmiri crewel-work is in great demand throughout the world. Crewel is basically similar to chain stitch, done on a white background, though here the motifs, mainly styled flowers, do not cover the entire surface, and the background is not embroidered upon. Wool is almost invariably used in crewel-work and colour schemes are not as elaborate as in chain stitch.
